content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Jain

Written by Abhishek Jain. Prashant Jha. Deepak Venkateshan

Star Rajkummar Rao (Dhruv Shikhar). Kriti Sanon (Anya Mehra). Paresh Rawal (Purushottam Mishra). Ratna Pathak Shah (Deepti Kashyap). Aparshakti Khurana (Sandeep Sachdeva (Shunty)). Manu Rishi Chadha (Dr. Sanjeev Mehra). Prachi Shah (Rupa Mehra). Mazel Vyas (Kanika Mehta). Saanand Verma (Joginder Arora aka Shaadiram). Shibani Bedi (Tara Sachdeva). Avijit Dutt (Jagmohan Diwan). Aditya Tarnach (Sanket). Khabir Mehta (Chintu). Sarthak Sharma (Chotu (Junior Dhruv)). Himanshu Sharma (Rabban)

Language Hindi

Producers Alex Anthony Fernandes. Himanshu Joshi. Sanjeev Mishra. Yogiraj Shetty. Pawandeep Singh. Dinesh Vijan. Pooja Vijan

Production Maddock Films
